resources.string: We are a student-run, not for profit organization that is working towards better preparing high school students for their futures,
specifically with their transition in university through presentations and relevant experience.

• To learn with our students and clients so that we are always well informed and ready to go. 

 • To share with students our experience and knowledge in hopes that we can further their potential. 

 • To improve the environment that we enter in one way or another, always striving for tangible change.
